How many McDonald's fast food restaurants are there in the world and how much does one McDonald's fast food restaurant make in one day?
In: Business
Rate This Answer
McDonald's operates over 31,000 restaurants worldwide, new ones open all the time! And each makes around 100,000. a day. ChaCha! Answered
